TestCaseMetaData.name: M04_Update_Add
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It is based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR-S to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital has made changes to their test compendium: - Added CPT codes for the Stool culture with susceptibility reflex - Added CPT codes for the susceptibility panel - Added CPT codes for the individually orderable stool culture Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update messages with these changes to Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_1.0_4.1-M18_New_Approved and EDOS_1.0_5.1-M18_New_Limited and EDOS_2.1_1.1-M08_Update_Add and EDOS_2.1_2.1-M10_Update_Add have been completed.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M04 update message - action: addition
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update changes for addition of charge codes (CPT codes) for individually orderable tests as well as the new panels.
